name: The Maze (itch) (Reemedri6)
description:
A maze game created by Re'em Edri ( programming and music ) done in Unreal Engine 4.26 (blueprint language).

The gist of the game is the collect the red skulls and move on with the levels(there are 3 levels).

be carefull of some night creatures along the way.

now go collect them skulls!
